1. Combine all ingredients in your pot
2. Turn to a low heat, avoid boiling!!!

1. Gather all ingredients
2. Steam hot dogs in perferated hotel pan inside a non perforated hotel pan in the Rational untill fully cooked (5-7 minutes) dogs should not split (overcooked)
3. Building your dog!
-Put steamed dog on the grill to heat up (and get some awesome grill flavour) -In an untoasted bun spread your smashed avocado -Top avocado with shredded lettuce -Place grilled dog on top of lettuce base -Drizzle green goddes dressing on hot dog -Garnish with crrukmbled bacon and crumbled blue cheese.
SERVE!
